name: Pixel Whisperer
description:
Ludum Dare 38 Combo Entry

Pixel Whisperer a simulation with RTS elements. You are in control of the pixels behavior.

Warning: your pixels die in order to build stuff. Only allow to build if you've got enough pixels.

4 Buildings:

  • House: without a home pixels don't reproduce
  • Food: too long without food and your pixels will die
  • Tower: expands to the next cell
  • Army: produces soldier pixels to defend you from enemies. They need food too!

While playing please imagine beautiful pixelart. ;-)
